timeline.message: #6781 test for version before adding details
#6781 rely on versionId to get correct version

timeline.bodyText:
This is good, but let's move this logic onto a method on Dataset (in case we need to use it elsewhere some time, and then it makes this fewer lines, ie.
DatasetVersion dv = ds.getVersion(this.datasetVersionId);
timeline.author: scolapasta

replies.bodyText: added the suggested method to Dataset
replies.author: sekmiller
